name: simple-producer-consumer
description: A simple demo of producer and consumer node.js services

scripts.evaluator: npm run build && SPC_LOG_LEVEL_STDOUT=trace node bin/evaluator-logs.sh | bunyan -o json --strict | json -ga module msg evalResult
scripts.lint: npm run whitelist-generate-all; standard -v `cat ./whitelist-all.txt`; npm run whitelist-remove
scripts.test: npm run lint; npm run whitelist-generate-test; istanbul cover _mocha `cat ./whitelist-test.txt` && istanbul report clover; npm run whitelist-remove; istanbul check-coverage --statement 100 --branch 100 --function 100 --line 100
scripts.test-html-cov: npm run whitelist-generate-test; istanbul cover _mocha `cat ./whitelist-test.txt`; npm run whitelist-remove; open -a 'Google Chrome' coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.test-tap: npm run whitelist-generate-test; _mocha --reporter tap `cat ./whitelist-test.txt` | tee coverage/test.tap; npm run whitelist-remove

author: Casey Flynn <cflynn.us@gmail.com>
